name: Ablejs
tagline: The statics build tools for ablesky
body: ablejs ============= >The statics build tools for [ablesky](http://www.ablesky.com) ### Installation 1. ``` git clone git@github.com:ablesky/ablejs.git ``` 2. ``` npm install -g ablejs ``` ### Usage ablejs build project in command line:, by typing ablejs build patch in command line:, by typing ablejs patch:/your/patch/directory/in/file/system/ ### Mindmaps ### Documents See the [documents](doc/README.md). ### Release History See the [CHANGELOG](CHANGELOG).
